page.title: 09HOATH AND CHISLET CHURCHES
page.content: Neither Chislet nor Hoath has its own vicar.The Rev.Owen Williams,Vicar of St.Nicholas At Wade,is in charge of both parishes. { {St.Mary the Virgin at Chislet}is a large church.Part of the nave is being converted into a centre for meetings and social events.It has a peal of six bells and the bellringers practise on Wednesday evenings. { {Holy Cross at Hoath}is a small church.It has no bells but a good choir.There is a Youth Club on Thursday evenings and a Sunday Club for younger children .At the Christmas Eve Service the children do a Nativity play and a real donkey comes into church.
